name: HeiQ Synbio - Synbiotic Actives
description: HeiQ Synbio specializes in synbiotic technology combining probiotics and prebiotics for personal care and cosmetics. Their innovative approach leverages the synergistic benefits of probiotics and prebiotics working together to support skin microbiome health, barrier function, and overall skin wellness.
notes: HeiQ Synbio focuses on the synergistic combination of probiotics and prebiotics, representing cutting-edge microbiome science. Synbiotic approach provides comprehensive microbiome support through multiple mechanisms.
